channel.title: Working compiler-to stop the newbs with compiler questions

item.title: Working compiler-to stop the newbs with compiler questions
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“n00bf0rlyf3, post:2, topic:188093”]Works for me… But i just used this… it doesnt load the java page.

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit[/quote]
Read the date before posting next time.

Read full topic
item.source: Working compiler-to stop the newbs with compiler questions

item.source: Working compiler-to stop the newbs with compiler questions

item.title: Working compiler-to stop the newbs with compiler questions
item.dc:creator: @xsk1lzx xsk1lzx
item.description:
@xsk1lzx wrote:

i got an compiler…it really works:

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

dont mind the link just copy and paste in your file
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2008, 12:00:17 PM[/size][hr]some mod please sticky this?..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2008, 12:32:55 PM[/size][hr]please it will help ppl ALOT(ppl who dont know it then…)
